title: Business Competency Enhancement: Understanding and Applying Cultural Diversity in Collaborative Learning: Advanced Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in mathematical modeling and advanced statistical concepts, team communication experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the strengths and weaknesses of collaborative learning in diverse cultural contexts and select context-appropriate strategies.
Learners can clearly assign roles and design collaboration processes with 4-5 multicultural team members to solve complex mathematical problems.
Learners can execute and present mathematical communication methods considering cultural differences through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
